import java.util.Locale;
import java.util.Scanner;

public class Main {

    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
        Locale.setDefault(Locale.ENGLISH);
        Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
        int T = input.nextInt();
        input.nextLine();
        for (int t=0; t<T; t++) {
            String s = input.nextLine().trim();
            StringBuilder noSpaces = new StringBuilder();
            for (int i=0; i<s.length(); i++) {
                char c = s.charAt(i);
                if (c != ' ') {
                    noSpaces.append(c);
                }
            }
            s = noSpaces.toString();
            int eqIndex = s.indexOf('=');
            String valueS = s.substring(eqIndex+1).trim();
            double answer;
            if (valueS.contains("x")) {
                if (s.indexOf('+') != -1) {
                    int opIndex = s.indexOf('+');
                    String leftS = s.substring(0,opIndex).trim();
                    String rightS = s.substring(opIndex+1,eqIndex).trim();
                    answer = Double.parseDouble(leftS)+Double.parseDouble(rightS);
                } else if (s.indexOf('*') != -1) {
                    int opIndex = s.indexOf('*');
                    String leftS = s.substring(0,opIndex).trim();
                    String rightS = s.substring(opIndex+1,eqIndex).trim();
                    answer = Double.parseDouble(leftS)*Double.parseDouble(rightS);
                } else if (s.indexOf('/') != -1) {
                    int opIndex = s.indexOf('/');
                    String leftS = s.substring(0,opIndex).trim();
                    String rightS = s.substring(opIndex+1,eqIndex).trim();
                    answer = Double.parseDouble(leftS)/Double.parseDouble(rightS);
                } else {
                    int opIndex = s.indexOf('-');
                    if (opIndex == 0) {
                        opIndex = s.indexOf('-',1);
                    }
                    String leftS = s.substring(0,opIndex).trim();
                    String rightS = s.substring(opIndex+1,eqIndex).trim();
                    answer = Double.parseDouble(leftS)-Double.parseDouble(rightS);                    
                }
                if (valueS.contains("-x")) answer = -answer;
            } else {
                double value = Double.parseDouble(valueS);
                if (s.indexOf('+') != -1) {
                    int opIndex = s.indexOf('+');
                    String leftS = s.substring(0,opIndex).trim();
                    String rightS = s.substring(opIndex+1,eqIndex).trim();
                    if (leftS.contains("x")) {
                        double right = Double.parseDouble(rightS);
                        answer = value-right;
                        if (leftS.contains("-x")) answer = -answer;
                    } else {
                        double left = Double.parseDouble(leftS);
                        answer = value-left;
                        if (rightS.contains("-x")) answer = -answer;
                    }
                } else if (s.indexOf('*') != -1) {
                    int opIndex = s.indexOf('*');
                    String leftS = s.substring(0,opIndex).trim();
                    String rightS = s.substring(opIndex+1,eqIndex).trim();
                    if ("x".equals(leftS)) {
                        double right = Double.parseDouble(rightS);
                        answer = value/right;
                        if (leftS.contains("-x")) answer = -answer;
                    } else {
                        double left = Double.parseDouble(leftS);
                        answer = value/left;
                        if (rightS.contains("-x")) answer = -answer;
                    }
                } else if (s.indexOf('/') != -1) {
                    int opIndex = s.indexOf('/');
                    String leftS = s.substring(0,opIndex).trim();
                    String rightS = s.substring(opIndex+1,eqIndex).trim();
                    if ("x".equals(leftS)) {
                        double right = Double.parseDouble(rightS);
                        answer = value*right;
                        if (leftS.contains("-x")) answer = -answer;
                    } else {
                        double left = Double.parseDouble(leftS);
                        answer = left/value;
                        if (rightS.contains("-x")) answer = -answer;
                    }
                } else {
                    int opIndex = s.indexOf('-');
                    if (opIndex == 0) {
                        opIndex = s.indexOf('-',1);
                    }
                    String leftS = s.substring(0,opIndex).trim();
                    String rightS = s.substring(opIndex+1,eqIndex).trim();
                    if ("x".equals(leftS)) {
                        double right = Double.parseDouble(rightS);
                        answer = value+right;
                        if (leftS.contains("-x")) answer = -answer;
                    } else {
                        double left = Double.parseDouble(leftS);
                        answer = left-value;
                        if (rightS.contains("-x")) answer = -answer;
                    }
                }
            }
            System.out.printf("%.6f\n", answer);
        }
    }

}
